code: import{useState}from"react";import api from"../api";import'../pages/Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Login(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=async()=>{const{data}=await api.post('/api/auth/login',{email,password});localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);alert("נרשמת בהצלחה");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text",children:"\u05D4\u05EA\u05D7\u05D1\u05E8\u05D5\u05EA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"\u05DE\u05D9\u05D9\u05DC",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",placeholder:"\u05E1\u05D9\u05E1\u05DE\u05D0",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"\u05D4\u05EA\u05D7\u05D1\u05E8"})]});}
